successful_strategies.strategy: As villager: Voice suspicions immediately, trust gut feelings, pressure suspects
successful_strategies.learned: Won as villager! My deduction worked. Spoke 3 times. Keep questioning.

failed_strategies.strategy: I relied heavily on gut feelings and immediate emotional reactions to express my suspicions early on.
failed_strategies.learned: ❌ LOST as villager: Over-reliance on gut feelings without presenting any logical reasoning or evidence led to accusations of vagueness and chaos, making me a target for criticism and deflection.
